content: {A歪头}A new house? Are we getting a new neighbor? Need me to roar on their roof? They say my roar can scare away pests.

content: What kind of stone did they build their house out of? {A想象中}Some types of stone only look hard. Guess I'll have to check if they're really up to the job...
